sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Find the mean proportion of 36.3 and 0.3 
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": " The mean proportion of \[\input[s1v1]{}\] and 0.3 is \[\sqrt{36.3 \times 0.3 }\]."}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "\[
	= \sqrt{\frac{\input[s2v1]{} \times 3.0 }{100}}\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "\[=\frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{10} = 3.3\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "Since, 
\[
	\input[s4v1]{} \times 3.0 = 1089 = 33 ^2
\]
\newline"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [36.3], "text": "Using the formula for mean proportion which is $\sqrt{a\times b}$, where $a$ and $b$ are numbers."}, {"data": [363.0], "text": "We can simplify the product of the two numbers by dividing both the numbers by 100, which can be written as \[\sqrt{\frac{363.0 \times 3.0 }{100}}\]."}, {"data": [33], "text": "Taking square root and simplifing we get\[=\frac{33 }{10} = 3.3\]"}, {"data": [363.0], "text": "Further simplification will get us to the required result 33."}]
